Local Indie Bookstore.description: Exchange to celebrate an inspiring visit and bring home a new book.

Large Chain Bookstore.description: Exchange to mark the joy of exploring a vast store and returning with a new find.

Bookish Item.description: Purchase a bookish item like bookmarks, reading lights, or other reading accessories.

One Month of a Book Box Subscription.description: Subscribe to a book box service for one month.

Deluxe or Special Edition.description: Purchase a deluxe or special edition of a book.
